segments.text: Hello , is this 4482098 7 ? I'd like to speak to Mr Doff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry . Mr . Doff is out right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I know when he will be back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . But he will certainly be back for lunch . This is his wife speaking . Can I take a message for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Mrs . Doff . Please tell him to be at the airport at three p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very Good . I will let him know as soon as he comes back . But , may I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Lucy White . Thank you . Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
